column1: '''''The Hobbit Calendar 1976''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[George Allen and Unwin
column2: George Allen & Unwin]] in [[1975]]. It features art by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]''.

column1: * Cover - From the jacket of the original edition [of ''[[The Hobbit]]'']

column2: Bilbo comes to the Huts of the Raft-elves]]"

column1: * July - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - The Elvenking's Gate (II) (Colored by H. E. Riddett).jpg
